Achievements.Name: No Deaths
Achievements.Description: Finish any level without losing any Cops.

Achievements.Name: All Arrests
Achievements.Description: Arrest all criminals in any level.

Achievements.Name: All Missions
Achievements.Description: Complete all the game missions in normal mode.

Achievements.Name: No Hits
Achievements.Description: Finish a level without any of your Cops getting hit.

Achievements.Name: Nightmare Mode
Achievements.Description: Complete all the game missions in Nightmare Mode.

Achievements.Name: Hardcore Mode
Achievements.Description: Complete all the game missions in Hardcore Mode.
